# Hi, I’m **Bailey Meche**

**Quantitative Researcher & Computational Economist** in the MACSS–Econ program at the University of Chicago.  
I build research-grade pipelines for macro/finance, market microstructure, and reproducible analytics.

- **Focus:** Treasury market microstructure, TIPS–Treasury arbitrage, financial frictions, options & fixed income
- **Tooling:** Python (NumPy, Pandas, Numba, Dask, mpi4py, PySpark), R, Julia, C/C++, MATLAB, JS; HPC & cloud
- **Platforms:** Midway3 HPC, AWS/GCP; Bloomberg Terminal
- **Location:** Chicago, IL  ·  **Email:** <baileymeche@uchicago.edu>  ·  **GitHub:** <https://github.com/BaileyMeche>  ·  **LinkedIn:** <https://www.linkedin.com/in/bailey-meche>  <!-- :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1} -->
